tasks.title: Web Developer
tasks.details: Front-End Developer My role is to write and style the front-end components that meet the requirements of our mocks and fulfill our user stories. I also monitor and process pull requests for production deployments. Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Sass, JavaScript, AJAX, APIs, OOP, JSON, XML, and React.js. Take a look at my work or get in touch! >> https://m-hassaan.netlify.app/
